name: Junior Analyst
description:
AMAZING RED is a multi-brand stores chain sells clothes, shoes and accessories from the leading sports brands PUMA, Nike, Asics and others.

At the moment the network has more than 100 stores throughout Russia. We are looking for positive, confident, active, progressive candidates.

KEY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Managing retail reports: support regular reports and providing reports on request
  • Support of Retail team and stores with documents flow
  • Support of communication flow between Central office and stores
  • Assist in ordering consumable materials for stores
  • Preparing presentations upon request
  • Support in working procedures and creating instruments of automation processes
  • Assist team members in all administrative matters (documents, printing etc.)

QUALIFICATION REQUIREMENTS:

  • Desire to develop in Retail
  • Focus on details and passion for numbers
  • Customer-oriented approach
  • Final year student / High Degree (full time: 40 hours per week)
  • Excellent PC skills —MS Office (especially Excel, Power Point)
  • Have exceptional problem-solving skills
  • English – intermediate level
  • Experience in Retail will be a plus

BENEFITS:

  • Competitive salary package
  • Discount on products
  • Sports and Fun @ work activities
  • Modern office
  • VHI program
  • Informal international environment and corporate culture
  • Company with a vision of fair, honest, positive and creative
